instructions.1: Brush one side of 4 bread slices lightly with 1/2 of dressing; place, dressing side down, on cutting board. Top each with equal amounts of cheese, beef pastrami and peppers.
instructions.2: Spread one side of remaining 4 bread slices evenly with pesto; place, pesto side down, on top of sandwiches. Brush tops of bread slices lightly with remaining dressing.
instructions.3: Meanwhile heat skillet over medium heat until hot. Place sandwiches in skillet; cook 4 to 6 minutes or until bread is toasted and cheese is melted, turning once. Cut sandwiches in half. Serve immediately.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the sandwiches from Step 2 being used?
Is cheese from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is sandwiches from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is pesto from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to place the sandwiches in Step 3?
Can we brush (Step 1) and heat (Step 3) at the same time?
